class.name: TrackingAPI
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: This class provides all functionality required to track a course and manages the tracking method. This class should not be instanced directly and is available globablly as TrackingManager

constructor.param: A reference to the course object
The minimum score the user can receive.
The maximum score the user can receive.
The score required to pass the course

class.property: A reference to the course object
The score required to pass the course
The minimum score the user can receive
The minimum score the user can receive
The current score the user has received
The method used to track this course. Currently only Scorm is provided.
A reference to the selected tracking method's api, currently only Scorm is provided.
Has the current tracking method been able to find a provided adaptor? Currently only Scorm is provided.
